In the fifth and sixth years the city was completed. The various marquises came to the assembly. In the tenth month they had court congratulations.

sentences.zh: 七年秋八月戊寅，孝惠帝崩。

translations.literal: Seventh year autumn eighth month Wu Yin, Xiao Hui Emperor passed.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh year, autumn, eighth month, Wu Yin day, Emperor Xiaohui passed.

sentences.zh: 發喪，太后哭，泣不下。

translations.literal: Issued mourning, empress dowager cried, tears not descend.
translations.idiomatic: The mourning was issued. The Empress Dowager cried. Tears did not descend.

sentences.zh: 留侯子張辟彊為侍中，年十五，謂丞相曰：「太后獨有孝惠，今崩，哭不悲，君知其解乎？」

translations.literal: Liu Hou son Zhang Pi Qiang was attendant middle, age fifteen, said to chancellor: 'Empress dowager alone has Xiao Hui, now passed, cries not sorrowful, lord knows its explanation?'
translations.idiomatic: Marquis Liu's son Zhang Pijiang was Attendant in the Palace, age fifteen. He said to the chancellor: 'The Empress Dowager alone had Emperor Xiaohui. Now he has passed. Her cries are not sorrowful. Does my lord know the explanation?'

sentences.zh: 丞相曰：「何解？」

translations.literal: Chancellor said: 'What explanation?'
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor said: 'What explanation?'

sentences.zh: 辟彊曰：「帝毋壯子，太后畏君等。

translations.literal: Pi Qiang said: 'Emperor no adult sons, empress dowager fears lords etc.
translations.idiomatic: Pijiang said: 'The emperor has no adult sons. The Empress Dowager fears you lords.'

sentences.zh: 君今請拜呂臺、呂產、呂祿為將，將兵居南北軍，及諸呂皆入宮，居中用事，如此則太后心安，君等幸得脫禍矣。」

translations.literal: Lord now please appoint Lu Tai, Lu Chan, Lu Lu as generals, lead troops reside north south armies, and various Lu all enter palace, reside center use affairs, thus then empress dowager heart peaceful, lords etc. fortunate able escape calamity.'
translations.idiomatic: My lord should now request to appoint Lü Tai, Lü Chan, Lü Lu as generals. Have them lead troops and reside in the northern and southern armies. And have all the various Lü enter the palace and reside in the center managing affairs. Thus the Empress Dowager's heart will be peaceful. You lords will fortunately be able to escape calamity.'

sentences.zh: 丞相乃如辟彊計。

translations.literal: Chancellor then like Pi Qiang plan.
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor then followed Pijiang's plan.

sentences.zh: 太后說，其哭乃哀。

translations.literal: Empress dowager pleased, her cries then sorrowful.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager was pleased. Her cries then became sorrowful.

sentences.zh: 呂氏權由此起。

translations.literal: Lu clan authority from this rose.
translations.idiomatic: The Lü clan's authority arose from this.

sentences.zh: 乃大赦天下。

translations.literal: Then great amnesty world.
translations.idiomatic: She then granted a great amnesty to the world.

sentences.zh: 九月辛丑，葬。

translations.literal: Ninth month Xin Chou, buried.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, Xin Chou day, burial took place.

sentences.zh: 太子即位為帝，謁高廟。

translations.literal: Crown prince ascended position as emperor, announced Gao temple.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince ascended the position as emperor. He announced at Gao temple.

sentences.zh: 元年，號令一出太后。

translations.literal: First year, orders all issued empress dowager.
translations.idiomatic: In the first year, all orders issued from the Empress Dowager.

translations.literal: In the seventh year, autumn, eighth month, Wu Yin day, Emperor Xiaohui passed. The mourning was issued. The Empress Dowager cried. Tears did not descend. Marquis Liu's son Zhang Pijiang was Attendant in the Palace, age fifteen. He said to the chancellor: 'The Empress Dowager alone had Emperor Xiaohui. Now he has passed. Her cries are not sorrowful. Does my lord know the explanation?' The chancellor said: 'What explanation?' Pijiang said: 'The emperor has no adult sons. The Empress Dowager fears you lords.' My lord should now request to appoint Lü Tai, Lü Chan, Lü Lu as generals. Have them lead troops and reside in the northern and southern armies. And have all the various Lü enter the palace and reside in the center managing affairs. Thus the Empress Dowager's heart will be peaceful. You lords will fortunately be able to escape calamity.' The chancellor then followed Pijiang's plan. The Empress Dowager was pleased. Her cries then became sorrowful. The Lü clan's authority arose from this. She then granted a great amnesty to the world. In the ninth month, Xin Chou day, burial took place. The crown prince ascended the position as emperor. He announced at Gao temple. In the first year, all orders issued from the Empress Dowager.

sentences.zh: 太后稱制，議欲立諸呂為王，問右丞相王陵。

translations.literal: Empress dowager claimed regency, discussed wished establish various Lu as wang, asked right chancellor Wang Ling.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager claimed regency. She discussed wishing to establish the various Lü as kings. She asked Right Chancellor Wang Ling.

sentences.zh: 王陵曰：「高帝刑白馬盟曰『非劉氏而王，天下共擊之』。

translations.literal: Wang Ling said: 'Gao Di executed white horse oath said 'not Liu clan and wang, world together strike it'.
translations.idiomatic: Wang Ling said: 'The High Emperor executed the white horse oath saying 'if not Liu clan and become king, the world together shall strike it'.'

sentences.zh: 今王呂氏，非約也。」

translations.literal: Now wang Lu clan, not covenant.'
translations.idiomatic: Now to make Lü clan kings is not according to the covenant.'

sentences.zh: 太后不說。

translations.literal: Empress dowager not pleased.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager was not pleased.

sentences.zh: 問左丞相陳平、絳侯周勃。

translations.literal: Asked left chancellor Chen Ping, Jiang Hou Zhou Bo.
translations.idiomatic: She asked Left Chancellor Chen Ping and Marquis Jiang Zhou Bo.

sentences.zh: 勃等對曰：「高帝定天下，王子弟，今太后稱制，王昆弟諸呂，無所不可。」

translations.literal: Bo etc. answered: 'Gao Di pacified world, wang sons younger brothers, now empress dowager claims regency, wang brothers various Lu, nothing unacceptable.'
translations.idiomatic: Zhou Bo and the others answered: 'The High Emperor pacified the world and made his sons and younger brothers kings. Now the Empress Dowager claims regency. To make her brothers the various Lü kings is nothing unacceptable.'

sentences.zh: 太后喜，罷朝。

translations.literal: Empress dowager happy, dismissed court.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager was happy. She dismissed court.

sentences.zh: 王陵讓陳平、絳侯曰：「始與高帝啑血盟，諸君不在邪？

translations.literal: Wang Ling rebuked Chen Ping, Jiang Hou said: 'Beginning with Gao Di smeared blood oath, various lords not present evil?
translations.idiomatic: Wang Ling rebuked Chen Ping and Marquis Jiang saying: 'At the beginning when we smeared blood and made oath with the High Emperor, were you various lords not present?'

sentences.zh: 今高帝崩，太后女主，欲王呂氏，諸君從欲阿意背約，何面目見高帝地下？」

translations.literal: Now Gao Di passed, empress dowager female ruler, wishes wang Lu clan, various lords follow desire flatter intent break covenant, what face see Gao Di underground?'
translations.idiomatic: Now the High Emperor has passed. The Empress Dowager is female ruler. She wishes to make Lü clan kings. You various lords follow her desires, flatter her intent, break the covenant. With what face will you see the High Emperor underground?'

sentences.zh: 陳平、絳侯曰：「於今面折廷爭，臣不如君；

translations.literal: Chen Ping, Jiang Hou said: 'At present face rebuke court contend, minister not as good as lord;
translations.idiomatic: Chen Ping and Marquis Jiang said: 'At present, in face-to-face rebuke and court contention, this minister is not as good as my lord.'

sentences.zh: 夫全社稷，定劉氏之後，君亦不如臣。」

translations.literal: Indeed preserve altar grain, stabilize Liu clan posterity, lord also not as good as minister.'
translations.idiomatic: Indeed, in preserving the state and stabilizing the Liu clan's posterity, my lord is also not as good as this minister.'

sentences.zh: 王陵無以應之。

translations.literal: Wang Ling without to respond it.
translations.idiomatic: Wang Ling had nothing with which to respond.

sentences.zh: 十一月，太后欲廢王陵，乃拜為帝太傅，奪之相權。

translations.literal: Eleventh month, empress dowager wished abolish Wang Ling, then appointed as emperor grand tutor, seized his chancellor authority.
translations.idiomatic: In the eleventh month, the Empress Dowager wished to abolish Wang Ling. She then appointed him as the emperor's grand tutor. She seized his chancellor authority.

sentences.zh: 王陵遂病免歸。

translations.literal: Wang Ling then illness resigned returned.
translations.idiomatic: Wang Ling then pleaded illness and resigned to return home.

sentences.zh: 乃以左丞相平為右丞相，以辟陽侯審食其為左丞相。

translations.literal: Then with left chancellor Ping as right chancellor, with Piyang Hou Shen Shi Qi as left chancellor.
translations.idiomatic: She then made Left Chancellor Ping the Right Chancellor. She made Marquis Piyang Shen Shiqi the Left Chancellor.

sentences.zh: 左丞相不治事，令監宮中，如郎中令。

translations.literal: Left chancellor not manage affairs, ordered oversee palace middle, like gentleman middle commander.
translations.idiomatic: The Left Chancellor did not manage affairs. He was ordered to oversee the palace interior, like the Gentleman-in-Attendance.

sentences.zh: 食其故得幸太后，常用事，公卿皆因而決事。

translations.literal: Shi Qi formerly obtained favor empress dowager, often used affairs, dukes ministers all because of it decided affairs.
translations.idiomatic: Shen Shiqi had formerly obtained the Empress Dowager's favor. He often managed affairs. The dukes and ministers all decided affairs through him.

sentences.zh: 乃追尊酈侯父為悼武王，欲以王諸呂為漸。

translations.literal: Then posthumously honored Li Hou father as Dao Wu Wang, wished with wang various Lu as gradual.
translations.idiomatic: She then posthumously honored Lord Li's father as King Dao Wu. She wished to use this as a gradual approach to making the various Lü kings.

translations.literal: The Empress Dowager claimed regency. She discussed wishing to establish the various Lü as kings. She asked Right Chancellor Wang Ling. Wang Ling said: 'The High Emperor executed the white horse oath saying 'if not Liu clan and become king, the world together shall strike it'.' Now to make Lü clan kings is not according to the covenant.' The Empress Dowager was not pleased. She asked Left Chancellor Chen Ping and Marquis Jiang Zhou Bo. Zhou Bo and the others answered: 'The High Emperor pacified the world and made his sons and younger brothers kings. Now the Empress Dowager claims regency. To make her brothers the various Lü kings is nothing unacceptable.' The Empress Dowager was happy. She dismissed court. Wang Ling rebuked Chen Ping and Marquis Jiang saying: 'At the beginning when we smeared blood and made oath with the High Emperor, were you various lords not present?' Now the High Emperor has passed. The Empress Dowager is female ruler. She wishes to make Lü clan kings. You various lords follow her desires, flatter her intent, break the covenant. With what face will you see the High Emperor underground?' Chen Ping and Marquis Jiang said: 'At present, in face-to-face rebuke and court contention, this minister is not as good as my lord.' Indeed, in preserving the state and stabilizing the Liu clan's posterity, my lord is also not as good as this minister.' Wang Ling had nothing with which to respond. In the eleventh month, the Empress Dowager wished to abolish Wang Ling. She then appointed him as the emperor's grand tutor. She seized his chancellor authority. Wang Ling then pleaded illness and resigned to return home. She then made Left Chancellor Ping the Right Chancellor. She made Marquis Piyang Shen Shiqi the Left Chancellor. The Left Chancellor did not manage affairs. He was ordered to oversee the palace interior, like the Gentleman-in-Attendance. Shen Shiqi had formerly obtained the Empress Dowager's favor. He often managed affairs. The dukes and ministers all decided affairs through him. She then posthumously honored Lord Li's father as King Dao Wu. She wished to use this as a gradual approach to making the various Lü kings.

sentences.zh: 四月，太后欲侯諸呂，乃先封高祖之功臣郎中令無擇為博城侯。

translations.literal: Fourth month, empress dowager wished hou various Lu, then first enfeoffed Gao Zu merit minister gentleman middle commander Wu Ze as Bo Cheng Hou.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month, the Empress Dowager wished to make the various Lü marquises. She then first enfeoffed the High Emperor's meritorious minister Gentleman-in-Attendance Wu Ze as Lord Bo Cheng.

sentences.zh: 魯元公主薨，賜謚為魯元太后。

translations.literal: Lu Yuan princess passed, granted posthumous title Lu Yuan empress dowager.
translations.idiomatic: Princess Lu Yuan passed. She was granted the posthumous title Empress Dowager Lu Yuan.

sentences.zh: 子偃為魯王。

translations.literal: Son Yan as Lu Wang.
translations.idiomatic: Her son Yan became King of Lu.

sentences.zh: 魯王父，宣平侯張敖也。

translations.literal: Lu Wang father, Xuanping Hou Zhang Ao also.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Lu's father was Marquis Xuanping Zhang Ao.

sentences.zh: 封齊悼惠王子章為朱虛侯，以呂祿女妻之。

translations.literal: Enfeoffed Qi Dao Hui Wang son Zi Zhang as Zhu Xu Hou, with Lu Lu daughter wife him.
translations.idiomatic: She enfeoffed King Dao Hui of Qi's son Zizhang as Lord Zhu Xu. She married Lü Lu's daughter to him.

sentences.zh: 齊丞相壽為平定侯。

translations.literal: Qi chancellor Shou as Ping Ding Hou.
translations.idiomatic: The Qi chancellor Shou became Lord Ping Ding.

sentences.zh: 少府延為梧侯。

translations.literal: Shao Fu Yan as Wu Hou.
translations.idiomatic: The lesser treasurer Yan became Lord Wu.

sentences.zh: 乃封呂種為沛侯，呂平為扶柳侯，張買為南宮侯。

translations.literal: Then enfeoffed Lu Zhong as Pei Hou, Lu Ping as Fu Liu Hou, Zhang Mai as Nan Gong Hou.
translations.idiomatic: She then enfeoffed Lü Zhong as Lord Pei, Lü Ping as Lord Fu Liu, Zhang Mai as Lord Nan Gong.

translations.literal: In the fourth month, the Empress Dowager wished to make the various Lü marquises. She then first enfeoffed the High Emperor's meritorious minister Gentleman-in-Attendance Wu Ze as Lord Bo Cheng. Princess Lu Yuan passed. She was granted the posthumous title Empress Dowager Lu Yuan. Her son Yan became King of Lu. The King of Lu's father was Marquis Xuanping Zhang Ao. She enfeoffed King Dao Hui of Qi's son Zizhang as Lord Zhu Xu. She married Lü Lu's daughter to him. The Qi chancellor Shou became Lord Ping Ding. The lesser treasurer Yan became Lord Wu. She then enfeoffed Lü Zhong as Lord Pei, Lü Ping as Lord Fu Liu, Zhang Mai as Lord Nan Gong.

sentences.zh: 太后欲王呂氏，先立孝惠後宮子彊為淮陽王，子不疑為常山王，子山為襄城侯，子朝為軹侯，子武為壺關侯。

translations.literal: Empress dowager wished wang Lu clan, first established Xiao Hui rear palace son Qiang as Huaiyang Wang, son Bu Yi as Changshan Wang, son Shan as Xiangcheng Hou, son Zhao as Zhi Hou, son Wu as Huguan Hou.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager wished to make Lü clan kings. She first established Emperor Xiaohui's rear palace son Qiang as King of Huaiyang, son Buyi as King of Changshan, son Shan as Lord Xiangcheng, son Zhao as Lord Zhi, son Wu as Lord Huguan.

sentences.zh: 太后風大臣，大臣請立酈侯呂臺為呂王，太后許之。

translations.literal: Empress dowager hinted ministers, ministers requested establish Li Hou Lu Tai as Lu Wang, empress dowager permitted it.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager hinted to the ministers. The ministers requested to establish Lord Li Lü Tai as King Lü. The Empress Dowager permitted it.

sentences.zh: 建成康侯釋之卒，嗣子有罪，廢，立其弟呂祿為胡陵侯，續康侯後。

translations.literal: Jiancheng Kang Hou Shi Zhi passed, heir son had crime, abolished, established his younger brother Lu Lu as Hu Ling Hou, continued Kang Hou posterity.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Kang of Jiancheng Lü Shizhi passed. His heir son had crime. He was abolished. She established his younger brother Lü Lu as Lord Hu Ling to continue the Lord Kang's posterity.

sentences.zh: 二年，常山王薨，以其弟襄城侯山為常山王，更名義。

translations.literal: Second year, Changshan Wang passed, with his younger brother Xiangcheng Hou Shan as Changshan Wang, changed name Yi.
translations.idiomatic: In the second year, King of Changshan passed. She made his younger brother Lord Xiangcheng Shan the King of Changshan. She changed his name to Yi.

sentences.zh: 十一月，呂王臺薨，謚為肅王，太子嘉代立為王。

translations.literal: Eleventh month, Lu Wang Tai passed, posthumous title Su Wang, crown prince Jia substitute established as wang.
translations.idiomatic: In the eleventh month, King Lü Tai passed. He was given the posthumous title King Su. Crown prince Jia was established to substitute as king.

sentences.zh: 三年，無事。

translations.literal: Third year, no affairs.
translations.idiomatic: In the third year, there were no affairs.

sentences.zh: 四年，封呂媭為臨光侯，呂他為俞侯，呂更始為贅其侯，呂忿為呂城侯，及諸侯丞相五人。

translations.literal: Fourth year, enfeoffed Lu Kui as Lin Guang Hou, Lu Ta as Yu Hou, Lu Geng Shi as Zhui Qi Hou, Lu Fen as Lu Cheng Hou, and various hou chancellors five people.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth year, she enfeoffed Lü Kui as Lord Lin Guang, Lü Ta as Lord Yu, Lü Gengshi as Lord Zhui Qi, Lü Fen as Lord Lü Cheng, and five chancellors of the various marquises.

translations.literal: The Empress Dowager wished to make Lü clan kings. She first established Emperor Xiaohui's rear palace son Qiang as King of Huaiyang, son Buyi as King of Changshan, son Shan as Lord Xiangcheng, son Zhao as Lord Zhi, son Wu as Lord Huguan. The Empress Dowager hinted to the ministers. The ministers requested to establish Lord Li Lü Tai as King Lü. The Empress Dowager permitted it. Lord Kang of Jiancheng Lü Shizhi passed. His heir son had crime. He was abolished. She established his younger brother Lü Lu as Lord Hu Ling to continue the Lord Kang's posterity. In the second year, King of Changshan passed. She made his younger brother Lord Xiangcheng Shan the King of Changshan. She changed his name to Yi. In the eleventh month, King Lü Tai passed. He was given the posthumous title King Su. Crown prince Jia was established to substitute as king. In the third year, there were no affairs. In the fourth year, she enfeoffed Lü Kui as Lord Lin Guang, Lü Ta as Lord Yu, Lü Gengshi as Lord Zhui Qi, Lü Fen as Lord Lü Cheng, and five chancellors of the various marquises.

sentences.zh: 宣平侯女為孝惠皇后時，無子，詳為有身，取美人子名之，殺其母，立所名子為太子。

translations.literal: Xuanping Hou female as Xiao Hui empress time, no sons, feigned as pregnant, took beautiful person son named it, killed its mother, established named son as crown prince.
translations.idiomatic: When the daughter of Marquis Xuanping was Emperor Xiaohui's empress, she had no sons. She feigned pregnancy. She took a beautiful woman's son and named him as her own. She killed the mother. She established the named son as crown prince.

sentences.zh: 孝惠崩，太子立為帝。

translations.literal: Xiao Hui passed, crown prince established as emperor.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Xiaohui passed. The crown prince was established as emperor.

sentences.zh: 帝壯，或聞其母死，非真皇后子，乃出言曰：「后安能殺吾母而名我？

translations.literal: Emperor matured, someone heard his mother died, not true empress son, then spoke saying: 'Empress how able kill my mother and name me?
translations.idiomatic: The emperor matured. Someone heard that his mother had died and that he was not the true empress's son. He then spoke saying: 'How could the empress kill my mother and name me as her own?

sentences.zh: 我未壯，壯即為變。」

translations.literal: I not yet mature, mature then make change.'
translations.idiomatic: I am not yet mature. When I mature, I will make a change.'

sentences.zh: 太后聞而患之，恐其為亂，乃幽之永卷中，言帝病甚，左右莫得見。

translations.literal: Empress dowager heard and worried it, feared him make chaos, then imprisoned him Yong Juan middle, said emperor illness severe, attendants none able see.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager heard and was worried by it. She feared he would make chaos. She then imprisoned him in the Yongjuan. She said the emperor's illness was severe. His attendants could not see him.

sentences.zh: 太后曰：「凡有天下治為萬民命者，蓋之如天，容之如地，上有歡心以安百姓，百姓欣然以事其上，歡欣交通而天下治。

translations.literal: Empress dowager said: 'All have world govern as ten thousand people fate, cover like heaven, contain like earth, above has happy heart to pacify commoners, commoners joyfully to serve their superiors, happy joy communicate and world govern.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager said: 'All who govern the world and determine the fate of the ten thousand people must cover like heaven, contain like earth. Above must have happy hearts to pacify the commoners. The commoners must joyfully serve their superiors. Happy joy must communicate and the world be governed.

sentences.zh: 今皇帝病久不已，乃失惑惛亂，不能繼嗣奉宗廟祭祀，不可屬天下，其代之。」

translations.literal: Now emperor illness long not cease, then lost confused muddled chaotic, cannot continue heirs offer ancestral temple sacrifices, cannot entrust world, replace him.'
translations.idiomatic: Now the emperor's illness has long not ceased. He is then lost, confused, muddled, chaotic. He cannot continue the heirs and offer ancestral temple sacrifices. He cannot be entrusted with the world. Replace him.'

sentences.zh: 群臣皆頓首言：「皇太后為天下齊民計所以安宗廟社稷甚深，群臣頓首奉詔。」

translations.literal: Multitude ministers all kowtowed said: 'Empress dowager for world equal people plan so pacify ancestral temple altar grain very deep, multitude ministers kowtow receive decree.'
translations.idiomatic: All the ministers kowtowed and said: 'The Empress Dowager plans deeply for the world's equal people to pacify the ancestral temple and altar of grain. All ministers kowtow and receive the decree.'

sentences.zh: 帝廢位，太后幽殺之。

translations.literal: Emperor abolished position, empress dowager imprisoned killed him.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor's position was abolished. The Empress Dowager imprisoned and killed him.

sentences.zh: 五月丙辰，立常山王義為帝，更名曰弘。

translations.literal: Fifth month Bing Chen, established Changshan Wang Yi as emperor, changed name said Hong.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth month, Bing Chen day, King Yi of Changshan was established as emperor. His name was changed to Hong.

sentences.zh: 不稱元年者，以太后制天下事也。

translations.literal: Not called first year because empress dowager controlled world affairs.
translations.idiomatic: He did not call it the first year because the Empress Dowager controlled world affairs.

sentences.zh: 以軹侯朝為常山王。

translations.literal: With Zhi Hou Zhao as Changshan Wang.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Zhi Zhao became King of Changshan.

sentences.zh: 置太尉官，絳侯勃為太尉。

translations.literal: Established grand marshal office, Jiang Hou Bo as grand marshal.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Marshal office was established. Marquis Jiang Zhou Bo became Grand Marshal.

sentences.zh: 五年八月，淮陽王薨，以弟壺關侯武為淮陽王。

translations.literal: Fifth year eighth month, Huaiyang Wang passed, with younger brother Huguan Hou Wu as Huaiyang Wang.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth year, eighth month, King of Huaiyang passed. His younger brother Lord Huguan Wu became King of Huaiyang.

sentences.zh: 六年十月，太后曰呂王嘉居處驕恣，廢之，以肅王臺弟呂產為呂王。

translations.literal: Sixth year tenth month, empress dowager said Lu Wang Jia dwelling conduct arrogant unrestrained, abolished him, with Su Wang Tai younger brother Lu Chan as Lu Wang.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth year, tenth month, the Empress Dowager said King Lü Jia's dwelling and conduct were arrogant and unrestrained. She abolished him. King Su Tai's younger brother Lü Chan became King Lü.

sentences.zh: 夏，赦天下。

translations.literal: Summer, amnesty world.
translations.idiomatic: In summer, there was an amnesty for the world.

sentences.zh: 封齊悼惠王子興居為東牟侯。

translations.literal: Enfeoffed Qi Dao Hui Wang son Zi Xing Ju as Dong Mou Hou.
translations.idiomatic: King Dao Hui of Qi's son Zixingju was enfeoffed as Lord Dong Mou.

translations.literal: When the daughter of Marquis Xuanping was Emperor Xiaohui's empress, she had no sons. She feigned pregnancy. She took a beautiful woman's son and named him as her own. She killed the mother. She established the named son as crown prince. Emperor Xiaohui passed. The crown prince was established as emperor. The emperor matured. Someone heard that his mother had died and that he was not the true empress's son. He then spoke saying: 'How could the empress kill my mother and name me as her own? I am not yet mature. When I mature, I will make a change.' The Empress Dowager heard and was worried by it. She feared he would make chaos. She then imprisoned him in the Yongjuan. She said the emperor's illness was severe. His attendants could not see him. The Empress Dowager said: 'All who govern the world and determine the fate of the ten thousand people must cover like heaven, contain like earth. Above must have happy hearts to pacify the commoners. The commoners must joyfully serve their superiors. Happy joy must communicate and the world be governed. Now the emperor's illness has long not ceased. He is then lost, confused, muddled, chaotic. He cannot continue the heirs and offer ancestral temple sacrifices. He cannot be entrusted with the world. Replace him.' All the ministers kowtowed and said: 'The Empress Dowager plans deeply for the world's equal people to pacify the ancestral temple and altar of grain. All ministers kowtow and receive the decree.' The emperor's position was abolished. The Empress Dowager imprisoned and killed him. In the fifth month, Bing Chen day, King Yi of Changshan was established as emperor. His name was changed to Hong. He did not call it the first year because the Empress Dowager controlled world affairs. Lord Zhi Zhao became King of Changshan. The Grand Marshal office was established. Marquis Jiang Zhou Bo became Grand Marshal. In the fifth year, eighth month, King of Huaiyang passed. His younger brother Lord Huguan Wu became King of Huaiyang. In the sixth year, tenth month, the Empress Dowager said King Lü Jia's dwelling and conduct were arrogant and unrestrained. She abolished him. King Su Tai's younger brother Lü Chan became King Lü. In summer, there was an amnesty for the world. King Dao Hui of Qi's son Zixingju was enfeoffed as Lord Dong Mou.

sentences.zh: 七年正月，太后召趙王友。

translations.literal: Seventh year first month, empress dowager summoned Zhao Wang You.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh year, first month, the Empress Dowager summoned King You of Zhao.

sentences.zh: 友以諸呂女為受后，弗愛，愛他姬，諸呂女妒，怒去，讒之於太后，誣以罪過，曰：「呂氏安得王！

translations.literal: You with various Lu female as Shou Hou, not loved, loved other Ji, various Lu female jealous, angered left, slandered to empress dowager, falsely accused with crimes faults, said: 'Lu clan how able wang!
translations.idiomatic: You had taken a Lü clan daughter as Shou Hou. He did not love her. He loved another concubine. The Lü clan daughter was jealous. She angrily left. She slandered him to the Empress Dowager. She falsely accused him of crimes and faults, saying: 'How can the Lü clan become kings!

sentences.zh: 太后百歲後，吾必擊之」。

translations.literal: Empress dowager hundred years after, I certainly strike them.'
translations.idiomatic: After the Empress Dowager is a hundred years old, I will certainly strike them.'

sentences.zh: 太后怒，以故召趙王。

translations.literal: The Empress Dowager was angered. Because of this she summoned King of Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager was angered. Because of this she summoned King of Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙王至，置邸不見，令衛圍守之，弗與食。

translations.literal: Zhao Wang arrived, placed residence not see, ordered guard surround defend him, not give food.
translations.idiomatic: King of Zhao arrived. He was placed in the residence but not seen. Guards were ordered to surround and defend him. He was not given food.

sentences.zh: 其群臣或竊饋，輒捕論之，趙王餓，乃歌曰：「諸呂用事兮劉氏危，迫脅王侯兮彊授我妃。

translations.literal: His ministers some secretly fed, then captured judged them, Zhao Wang hungry, then sang: 'Various Lu use affairs ah Liu clan danger, coerce threaten wang hou ah strong give me consort.
translations.idiomatic: His ministers secretly fed him some. They were then captured and judged. King of Zhao was hungry. He then sang: 'The various Lü use affairs, the Liu clan is in danger. They coerce and threaten kings and marquises, strongly giving me a consort.

sentences.zh: 我妃既妒兮誣我以惡，讒女亂國兮上曾不寤。

translations.literal: My consort already jealous ah falsely accuse me with evil, slander female chaos state ah above ever not awaken.
translations.idiomatic: My consort is already jealous, falsely accuses me of evil. The slanderous woman chaos the state, above never awakens.

sentences.zh: 我無忠臣兮何故棄國？

translations.literal: I without loyal ministers ah what reason abandon state?
translations.idiomatic: I have no loyal ministers. For what reason do they abandon the state?

sentences.zh: 自決中野兮蒼天舉直！

translations.literal: Self decide middle wilderness ah blue heaven raise straight!
translations.idiomatic: I will decide in the middle wilderness. Blue heaven raises the straight!

sentences.zh: 于嗟不可悔兮寧蚤自財。

translations.literal: Alas cannot regret ah rather early self wealth.
translations.idiomatic: Alas, it cannot be regretted. Rather early, make myself wealthy.

sentences.zh: 為王而餓死兮誰者憐之！

translations.literal: As wang and starve die ah who pity it!
translations.idiomatic: As king and starve to death, who will pity it!

sentences.zh: 呂氏絕理兮託天報仇。」

translations.literal: Lu clan cut off reason ah entrust heaven avenge.
translations.idiomatic: The Lü clan cuts off reason. I entrust heaven to avenge.

sentences.zh: 丁丑，趙王幽死，以民禮葬之長安民冢次。

translations.literal: Ding Chou, Zhao Wang imprisoned died, with commoner ritual buried him Chang'an commoner tomb beside.
translations.idiomatic: On Ding Chou day, King of Zhao died imprisoned. He was buried with commoner ritual beside the Chang'an commoner tombs.

translations.literal: In the seventh year, first month, the Empress Dowager summoned King You of Zhao. You had taken a Lü clan daughter as Shou Hou. He did not love her. He loved another concubine. The Lü clan daughter was jealous. She angrily left. She slandered him to the Empress Dowager. She falsely accused him of crimes and faults, saying: 'How can the Lü clan become kings! After the Empress Dowager is a hundred years old, I will certainly strike them.' The Empress Dowager was angered. Because of this she summoned King of Zhao. King of Zhao arrived. He was placed in the residence but not seen. Guards were ordered to surround and defend him. He was not given food. His ministers secretly fed him some. They were then captured and judged. King of Zhao was hungry. He then sang: 'The various Lü use affairs, the Liu clan is in danger. They coerce and threaten kings and marquises, strongly giving me a consort. My consort is already jealous, falsely accuses me of evil. The slanderous woman chaos the state, above never awakens. I have no loyal ministers. For what reason do they abandon the state? I will decide in the middle wilderness. Blue heaven raises the straight! Alas, it cannot be regretted. Rather early, make myself wealthy. As king and starve to death, who will pity it! The Lü clan cuts off reason. I entrust heaven to avenge. On Ding Chou day, King of Zhao died imprisoned. He was buried with commoner ritual beside the Chang'an commoner tombs.

sentences.zh: 己丑，日食，晝晦。

translations.literal: Ji Chou, solar eclipse, daytime dark.
translations.idiomatic: On Ji Chou day, there was a solar eclipse. Daytime was dark.

sentences.zh: 太后惡之，心不樂，乃謂左右曰：「此為我也。」

translations.literal: Empress dowager disliked it, heart not happy, then said to attendants: 'This for me.'
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager disliked it. Her heart was not happy. She then said to her attendants: 'This is for me.'

translations.literal: On Ji Chou day, there was a solar eclipse. Daytime was dark. The Empress Dowager disliked it. Her heart was not happy. She then said to her attendants: 'This is for me.'

sentences.zh: 二月，徙梁王恢為趙王。

translations.literal: Second month, moved Liang Wang Hui as Zhao Wang.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month, King Hui of Liang was moved to be King of Zhao.

sentences.zh: 呂王產徙為梁王，梁王不之國，為帝太傅。

translations.literal: Lu Wang Chan moved as Liang Wang, Liang Wang not go country, as emperor grand tutor.
translations.idiomatic: King Lü Chan was moved to be King of Liang. The King of Liang did not go to his country. He became Emperor Grand Tutor.

sentences.zh: 立皇子平昌侯太為呂王。

translations.literal: Established imperial son Pingchang Hou Tai as Lu Wang.
translations.idiomatic: The imperial son Lord Pingchang Tai was established as King Lü.

sentences.zh: 更名梁曰呂，呂曰濟川。

translations.literal: Changed name Liang called Lu, Lu called Ji Chuan.
translations.idiomatic: Liang was renamed Lü. Lü was renamed Ji Chuan.

sentences.zh: 太后女弟呂媭有女為營陵侯劉澤妻，澤為大將軍。

translations.literal: Empress dowager younger sister Lu Kui had daughter as Yingling Hou Liu Ze wife, Ze was grand general.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager's younger sister Lü Kui had a daughter who was the wife of Lord Yingling Liu Ze. Ze was Grand General.

sentences.zh: 太后王諸呂，恐即崩後劉將軍為害，乃以劉澤為瑯邪王，以慰其心。

translations.literal: Empress dowager wang various Lu, feared immediately pass after Liu general do harm, then with Liu Ze as Langya Wang, to comfort his heart.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager made the various Lü kings. She feared that after she passed, General Liu would do harm. She then made Liu Ze King of Langya to comfort his heart.

translations.literal: In the second month, King Hui of Liang was moved to be King of Zhao. King Lü Chan was moved to be King of Liang. The King of Liang did not go to his country. He became Emperor Grand Tutor. The imperial son Lord Pingchang Tai was established as King Lü. Liang was renamed Lü. Lü was renamed Ji Chuan. The Empress Dowager's younger sister Lü Kui had a daughter who was the wife of Lord Yingling Liu Ze. Ze was Grand General. The Empress Dowager made the various Lü kings. She feared that after she passed, General Liu would do harm. She then made Liu Ze King of Langya to comfort his heart.

sentences.zh: 梁王恢之徙王趙，心懷不樂。

translations.literal: Liang Wang Hui when moved wang Zhao, heart harbored not happy.
translations.idiomatic: When King Hui of Liang was moved to be King of Zhao, his heart harbored unhappiness.

sentences.zh: 太后以呂產女為趙王后。

translations.literal: Empress dowager with Lu Chan daughter as Zhao Wang Hou.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager made Lü Chan's daughter King of Zhao's queen.

sentences.zh: 王后從官皆諸呂，擅權，微伺趙王，趙王不得自恣。

translations.literal: Wang Hou attendants all various Lu, monopolized authority, secretly spied Zhao Wang, Zhao Wang not able self unrestrained.
translations.idiomatic: The queen's attendants were all various Lü. They monopolized authority. They secretly spied on King of Zhao. King of Zhao was not able to be unrestrained.

sentences.zh: 王有所愛姬，王后使人酖殺之。

translations.literal: Wang had loved Ji, wang hou made people poison kill her.
translations.idiomatic: The king had a beloved concubine. The queen had people poison and kill her.

sentences.zh: 王乃為歌詩四章，令樂人歌之。

translations.literal: Wang then made song poetry four chapters, ordered musicians sing it.
translations.idiomatic: The king then made song poetry in four chapters. He ordered musicians to sing it.

sentences.zh: 王悲，六月即自殺。

translations.literal: Wang sad, sixth month then suicide.
translations.idiomatic: The king was sad. In the sixth month he then committed suicide.

sentences.zh: 太后聞之，以為王用婦人棄宗廟禮，廢其嗣。

translations.literal: Empress dowager heard it, considered wang used woman abandoned ancestral temple ritual, abolished his heir.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager heard it. She considered the king used women and abandoned ancestral temple ritual. She abolished his heir.

translations.literal: When King Hui of Liang was moved to be King of Zhao, his heart harbored unhappiness. The Empress Dowager made Lü Chan's daughter King of Zhao's queen. The queen's attendants were all various Lü. They monopolized authority. They secretly spied on King of Zhao. King of Zhao was not able to be unrestrained. The king had a beloved concubine. The queen had people poison and kill her. The king then made song poetry in four chapters. He ordered musicians to sing it. The king was sad. In the sixth month he then committed suicide. The Empress Dowager heard it. She considered the king used women and abandoned ancestral temple ritual. She abolished his heir.

sentences.zh: 宣平侯張敖卒，以子偃為魯王，敖賜謚為魯元王。

translations.literal: Xuanping Hou Zhang Ao passed, with son Yan as Lu Wang, Ao granted posthumous title Lu Yuan Wang.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Xuanping Zhang Ao passed. His son Yan became King of Lu. Ao was granted the posthumous title King Lu Yuan.

translations.literal: Lord Xuanping Zhang Ao passed. His son Yan became King of Lu. Ao was granted the posthumous title King Lu Yuan.

sentences.zh: 秋，太后使使告代王，欲徙王趙。

translations.literal: Autumn, empress dowager made envoy inform Dai Wang, wished move wang Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: In autumn, the Empress Dowager sent an envoy to inform King of Dai. She wished to move him to be King of Zhao.

sentences.zh: 代王謝，願守代邊。

translations.literal: Dai Wang declined, wished guard Dai border.
translations.idiomatic: King of Dai declined. He wished to guard the Dai border.

translations.literal: In autumn, the Empress Dowager sent an envoy to inform King of Dai. She wished to move him to be King of Zhao. King of Dai declined. He wished to guard the Dai border.

sentences.zh: 太傅產、丞相平等言，武信侯呂祿上侯，位次第一，請立為趙王。

translations.literal: Grand tutor Chan, chancellor Ping etc. said, Wuxin Hou Lu Lu upper hou, position sequence first, please establish as Zhao Wang.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Tutor Chan and Chancellor Ping and others said: Lord Wuxin Lü Lu is an upper marquis. His position sequence is first. Please establish him as King of Zhao.

sentences.zh: 太后許之，追尊祿父康侯為趙昭王。

translations.literal: Empress dowager permitted it, posthumously honored Lu father Kang Hou as Zhao Zhao Wang.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager permitted it. She posthumously honored Lü's father Lord Kang as King Zhao Zhao.

sentences.zh: 九月，燕靈王建薨，有美人子，太后使人殺之，無後，國除。

translations.literal: Ninth month, Yan Ling Wang Jian passed, had beautiful person son, empress dowager made people kill him, no posterity, state eliminated.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, King Ling of Yan Jian passed. He had a beautiful woman's son. The Empress Dowager had people kill him. He had no posterity. The state was eliminated.

sentences.zh: 八年十月，立呂肅王子東平侯呂通為燕王，封通弟呂莊為東平侯。

translations.literal: Eighth year tenth month, established Lu Su Wang son Dongping Hou Lu Tong as Yan Wang, enfeoffed Tong younger brother Lu Zhuang as Dongping Hou.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth year, tenth month, King Su Lü's son Lord Dongping Lü Tong was established as King of Yan. Tong's younger brother Lü Zhuang was enfeoffed as Lord Dongping.

translations.literal: Grand Tutor Chan and Chancellor Ping and others said: Lord Wuxin Lü Lu is an upper marquis. His position sequence is first. Please establish him as King of Zhao. The Empress Dowager permitted it. She posthumously honored Lü's father Lord Kang as King Zhao Zhao. In the ninth month, King Ling of Yan Jian passed. He had a beautiful woman's son. The Empress Dowager had people kill him. He had no posterity. The state was eliminated. In the eighth year, tenth month, King Su Lü's son Lord Dongping Lü Tong was established as King of Yan. Tong's younger brother Lü Zhuang was enfeoffed as Lord Dongping.

sentences.zh: 三月中，呂后祓，還過軹道，見物如蒼犬，據高后掖，忽弗復見。

translations.literal: Third month middle, Lü Empress purification, returning passed Zhi road, saw object like green dog, seized Empress Gao armpit, suddenly not again seen.
translations.idiomatic: In the middle of the third month, Empress Lü performed purification rites. On her return, passing through Zhi Road, she saw an object like a green dog that seized Empress Gao's armpit, then suddenly it was not seen again.

sentences.zh: 卜之，云趙王如意為祟。

translations.literal: Divined it, said Zhao King Ruyi caused evil spirit.
translations.idiomatic: They divined it and said that King Ruyi of Zhao was causing the evil spirit.

sentences.zh: 高后遂病掖傷。

translations.literal: Empress Gao then sick armpit injury.
translations.idiomatic: Empress Gao then became sick from the armpit injury.

translations.literal: In the middle of the third month, Empress Lü performed purification rites. On her return, passing through Zhi Road, she saw an object like a green dog that seized Empress Gao's armpit, then suddenly it was not seen again. They divined it and said that King Ruyi of Zhao was causing the evil spirit. Empress Gao then became sick from the armpit injury.

sentences.zh: 高后為外孫魯元王偃年少，蚤失父母，孤弱，乃封張敖前姬兩子，侈為新都侯，壽為樂昌侯，以輔魯元王偃。

translations.literal: Empress Gao for maternal grandson Lu Yuan King Yan young, early lost parents, orphaned weak, then enfeoffed Zhang Ao former consort two sons, Chi as Xindu Hou, Shou as Lechang Hou, to assist Lu Yuan King Yan.
translations.idiomatic: Empress Gao, for her maternal grandson King Yuan of Lu, Yan, who was young and had early lost his parents, orphaned and weak, then enfeoffed the two sons of Zhang Ao's former consort - Chi as Marquis of Xindu, Shou as Marquis of Lechang - to assist King Yuan of Lu, Yan.

sentences.zh: 及封中大謁者張釋為建陵侯，呂榮為祝茲侯。

translations.literal: And enfeoffed Palace Chamberlain Zhang Shi as Jianling Hou, Lü Rong as Zhuzi Hou.
translations.idiomatic: And she enfeoffed the Palace Chamberlain Zhang Shi as Marquis of Jianling, Lü Rong as Marquis of Zhuzi.

sentences.zh: 諸中宦者令丞皆為關內侯，食邑五百戶。

translations.literal: Various palace eunuchs commanders assistants all became Guannei Hou, food fiefdom five hundred households.
translations.idiomatic: All the various palace eunuchs, commanders, and assistants became marquises within the pass, with fiefdoms of five hundred households.

translations.literal: Empress Gao, for her maternal grandson King Yuan of Lu, Yan, who was young and had early lost his parents, orphaned and weak, then enfeoffed the two sons of Zhang Ao's former consort - Chi as Marquis of Xindu, Shou as Marquis of Lechang - to assist King Yuan of Lu, Yan. And she enfeoffed the Palace Chamberlain Zhang Shi as Marquis of Jianling, Lü Rong as Marquis of Zhuzi. All the various palace eunuchs, commanders, and assistants became marquises within the pass, with fiefdoms of five hundred households.

sentences.zh: 七月中，高后病甚，乃令趙王呂祿為上將軍，軍北軍；

translations.literal: Seventh month middle, Empress Gao illness very severe, then commanded Zhao King Lü Lu as Supreme General, garrisoned Northern Army;
translations.idiomatic: In the middle of the seventh month, Empress Gao's illness became very severe, so she commanded King Lü of Zhao to be Supreme General, garrisoning the Northern Army;

sentences.zh: 呂王產居南軍。

translations.literal: Lü King Chan resided Southern Army.
translations.idiomatic: King Lü Chan resided over the Southern Army.

sentences.zh: 呂太后誡產、祿曰：「高帝已定天下，與大臣約，曰『非劉氏王者，天下共擊之』。

translations.literal: Lü Empress Dowager warned Chan, Lu said: 'Emperor Gao already pacified realm, with ministers covenant, said 'Not Liu clan kings, realm together attack them'.
translations.idiomatic: Empress Dowager Lü warned Chan and Lu saying: 'Emperor Gao has already pacified the realm, and made a covenant with the ministers, saying 'Those who are not kings of the Liu clan, the realm shall together attack them'.'

sentences.zh: 今呂氏王，大臣弗平。

translations.literal: Now Lü clan kings, ministers not peaceful.
translations.idiomatic: Now the Lü clan has kings, the ministers are not peaceful.

sentences.zh: 我即崩，帝年少，大臣恐為變。

translations.literal: I then collapse, emperor young, ministers fear make rebellion.
translations.idiomatic: If I then collapse, the emperor is young, the ministers fear they will make rebellion.

sentences.zh: 必據兵衛宮，慎毋送喪，毋為人所制。」
辛巳，高后崩，遺詔賜諸侯王各千金，將相列侯郎吏皆以秩賜金。
大赦天下。
以呂王產為相國，以呂祿女為帝后。

translations.literal: In the middle of the seventh month, Empress Gao's illness became very severe, so she commanded King Lü of Zhao to be Supreme General, garrisoning the Northern Army; King Lü Chan resided over the Southern Army. Empress Dowager Lü warned Chan and Lu saying: 'Emperor Gao has already pacified the realm, and made a covenant with the ministers, saying 'Those who are not kings of the Liu clan, the realm shall together attack them'.' Now the Lü clan has kings, the ministers are not peaceful. If I then collapse, the emperor is young, the ministers fear they will make rebellion.

sentences.zh: 高后已葬，以左丞相審食其為帝太傅。

translations.literal: After the High Empress was buried, they made Left Prime Minister Shen Yiji Grand Tutor of the Emperor.

sentences.zh: 朱虛侯劉章有氣力，東牟侯興居其弟也。
皆齊哀王弟，居長安。
當是時，諸呂用事擅權，欲為亂，畏高帝故大臣絳、灌等，未敢發。
朱虛侯婦，呂祿女，陰知其謀。

translations.literal: Zhuxu Hou wife, Lü Lu daughter, secretly knew their plot.
translations.idiomatic: The wife of the Marquis of Zhuxu, Lü Lu's daughter, secretly knew of their plot.

sentences.zh: 恐見誅，乃陰令人告其兄齊王，欲令發兵西，誅諸呂而立。

translations.literal: Feared seen executed, then secretly had person inform her brother Qi King, wished make dispatch troops west, execute various Lü and establish.
translations.idiomatic: Fearing she would be seen and executed, she then secretly had someone inform her brother the King of Qi, wishing to make him dispatch troops west, execute the various Lü clan members and establish himself.

sentences.zh: 朱虛侯欲從中與大臣為應。

translations.literal: Zhuxu Hou wished from within with ministers make response.
translations.idiomatic: The Marquis of Zhuxu wished to respond from within with the ministers.

sentences.zh: 齊王欲發兵，其相弗聽。

translations.literal: Qi King wished dispatch troops, his chancellor not listened.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Qi wished to dispatch troops, but his chancellor did not listen.

sentences.zh: 八月丙午，齊王欲使人誅相，相召平乃反，舉兵欲圍王，王因殺其相，遂發兵東，詐奪瑯邪王兵，并將之而西。

translations.literal: Eighth month bingwu, Qi King wished make person execute chancellor, chancellor Zhao Ping then rebelled, raised troops wished surround king, king then killed his chancellor, then dispatched troops east, falsely seized Langye King troops, combined led them west.
translations.idiomatic: On the bingwu day of the eighth month, the King of Qi wished to have someone execute his chancellor. Chancellor Zhao Ping then rebelled, raised troops wishing to surround the king. The king then killed his chancellor, then dispatched troops east, falsely seized the King of Langye's troops, combined and led them west.

sentences.zh: 語在齊王語中。

translations.literal: Words in Qi King biography middle.
translations.idiomatic: The words are in the Qi King biography.

translations.literal: The wife of the Marquis of Zhuxu, Lü Lu's daughter, secretly knew of their plot. Fearing she would be seen and executed, she then secretly had someone inform her brother the King of Qi, wishing to make him dispatch troops west, execute the various Lü clan members and establish himself. The Marquis of Zhuxu wished to respond from within with the ministers. The King of Qi wished to dispatch troops, but his chancellor did not listen. On the bingwu day of the eighth month, the King of Qi wished to have someone execute his chancellor. Chancellor Zhao Ping then rebelled, raised troops wishing to surround the king. The king then killed his chancellor, then dispatched troops east, falsely seized the King of Langye's troops, combined and led them west. The words are in the Qi King biography.

sentences.zh: 齊王乃遺諸侯王書曰：「高帝平定天下，王諸子弟，悼惠王王齊。

translations.literal: Qi King then sent feudal lord kings letter said: 'Emperor Gao pacified realm, enfeoffed various sons brothers, Dao Hui King enfeoffed Qi.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Qi then sent a letter to the feudal lord kings saying: 'Emperor Gao pacified the realm, enfeoffed his various sons and brothers. King Dao Hui was enfeoffed in Qi.

sentences.zh: 悼惠王薨，孝惠帝使留侯良立臣為齊王。

translations.literal: Dao Hui King passed away, Filial Hui emperor made Liu Hou Liang establish minister as Qi King.
translations.idiomatic: When King Dao Hui passed away, Emperor Xiaohui had Marquis Liu Hou Liang establish me as King of Qi.

sentences.zh: 孝惠崩，高后用事，春秋高，聽諸呂，擅廢帝更立，又比殺三趙王，滅梁、趙、燕以王諸呂，分齊為四。

translations.literal: Filial Hui collapsed, Empress Gao handled affairs, years high, listened to various Lü, monopolized deposed emperor changed establishment, moreover successively killed three Zhao kings, extinguished Liang, Zhao, Yan to enfeoff various Lü, divided Qi into four.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Xiaohui collapsed, Empress Gao handled affairs. She was advanced in years, listened to the various Lü clan, monopolized deposing the emperor and establishing another, moreover successively killed three kings of Zhao, extinguished Liang, Zhao, Yan to enfeoff the various Lü clan, and divided Qi into four.

sentences.zh: 忠臣進諫，上惑亂弗聽。
今高后崩，而帝春秋富，未能治天下，固恃大臣諸侯。
而諸呂又擅自尊官，聚兵嚴威，劫列侯忠臣，矯制以令天下，宗廟所以危。
寡人率兵入誅不當為王者。」
漢聞之，相國呂產等乃遣潁陰侯灌嬰將兵擊之。
灌嬰至滎陽，乃謀曰：「諸呂權兵關中，欲危劉氏而自立。
今我破齊還報，此益呂氏之資也。」
乃留屯滎陽，使使諭齊王及諸侯，與連和，以待呂氏變，共誅之。
齊王聞之，乃還兵西界待約。

translations.literal: The King of Qi then sent a letter to the feudal lord kings saying: 'Emperor Gao pacified the realm, enfeoffed his various sons and brothers. King Dao Hui was enfeoffed in Qi. When King Dao Hui passed away, Emperor Xiaohui had Marquis Liu Hou Liang establish me as King of Qi. Emperor Xiaohui collapsed, Empress Gao handled affairs. She was advanced in years, listened to the various Lü clan, monopolized deposing the emperor and establishing another, moreover successively killed three kings of Zhao, extinguished Liang, Zhao, Yan to enfeoff the various Lü clan, and divided Qi into four.

sentences.zh: 呂祿、呂產欲發亂關中，內憚絳侯、朱虛等，外畏齊、楚兵，又恐灌嬰畔之，欲待灌嬰兵與齊合而發，猶豫未決。
當是時，濟川王太、淮陽王武、常山王朝名為少帝弟，及魯元王呂后外孫，皆年少未之國，居長安。
趙王祿、梁王產各將兵居南北軍，皆呂氏之人。
列侯群臣莫自堅其命。

translations.literal: Lü Lu and Lü Chan wished to initiate disorder in Guanzhong but internally feared Marquis of Jiang, Zhuxu, and others, externally feared the troops of Qi and Chu, and also feared Guan Ying would rebel; they wished to wait for Guan Ying's troops to join with Qi before initiating, and hesitated without deciding. At that time, King Tai of Jichuan, King Wu of Huaiyang, King Zhao of Changshan were nominally younger brothers of the young emperor, and King Yan of Lu Yuan was Empress Lü's external grandson—all were young, had not yet gone to their states, and resided in Chang'an. King Lu of Zhao and King Chan of Liang each commanded troops stationed at the Southern and Northern Armies—all were Lü clan people. The ranked marquises and assembled ministers could not secure their own lives.

sentences.zh: 太尉絳侯勃不得入軍中主兵。
曲周侯酈商老病，其子寄與呂祿善。
絳侯乃與丞相陳平謀，使人劫酈商。
令其子寄往紿說呂祿曰：「高帝與呂后共定天下，劉氏所立九王，呂氏所立三王，皆大臣之議，事已布告諸侯，諸侯皆以為宜。
今太后崩，帝少，而足下佩趙王印，不急之國守藩，乃為上將，將兵留此，為大臣諸侯所疑。
足下何不歸印，以兵屬太尉？
請梁王歸相國印，與大臣盟而之國，齊兵必罷，大臣得安，足下高枕而王千里，此萬世之利也。」
呂祿信然其計，欲歸將印，以兵屬太尉。
使人報呂產及諸呂老人，或以為便，或曰不便，計猶豫未有所決。
呂祿信酈寄，時與出游獵。
過其姑呂媭，媭大怒，曰：「若為將而棄軍，呂氏今無處矣。」
乃悉出珠玉寶器散堂下，曰：「毋為他人守也」

translations.literal: Grand Commandant Marquis of Jiang Bo could not enter the army to command troops. Marquis of Quzhou Li Shang was old and ill; his son Ji was on good terms with Lü Lu. Marquis of Jiang then plotted with Prime Minister Chen Ping, had men coerce Li Shang. Ordered his son Ji to go and deceive and persuade Lu Lu saying: 'The High Emperor and Empress Lu jointly pacified the realm, the Liu clan established nine kings, the Lu clan established three kings, all were ministers' discussions, the matters have already been announced to the feudal lords, the feudal lords all considered it appropriate. Now the Empress Dowager has died, the emperor is young, yet you wear the King of Zhao's seal and do not urgently go to your state to defend your fief but instead serve as supreme general commanding troops remaining here—this causes the great ministers and feudal lords to suspect. Why do you not return the seal and hand over troops to the Grand Commandant? Request the King of Liang to return the prime minister's seal, make an oath with the great ministers and go to your state; the Qi troops will certainly be dismissed, the great ministers will be at ease, and you will rest easy while ruling a thousand li—this is benefit for ten thousand generations." Lü Lu believed and agreed with this plan, wishing to return the general's seal and hand over troops to the Grand Commandant. He sent men to report to Lü Chan and the various Lü elders; some considered it convenient, some said inconvenient; the planning hesitated without decision. Lü Lu trusted Li Ji and from time to time went out hunting with him. He passed by his aunt Lü Xu; Xu was greatly enraged and said: "You serve as general yet abandon the army; the Lü clan now has no place." She then brought out all pearls, jade, and precious vessels and scattered them below the hall, saying: "Do not keep them for others."

sentences.zh: 左丞相食其免。

translations.literal: Left Prime Minister Yiji was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 八月庚申旦，平陽侯窋行御史大夫事，見相國產計事。
郎中令賈壽使從齊來，因數產曰：「王不蚤之國，今雖欲行，尚可得邪？」
具以灌嬰與齊楚合從，欲誅諸呂告產，乃趣產急入宮。
平陽侯頗聞其語，乃馳告丞相、太尉。
太尉欲入北軍，不得入。
襄平侯通尚符節。
乃令持節矯內太尉北軍。
太尉復令酈寄與典客劉揭先說呂祿曰：「帝使太尉守北軍，欲足下之國，急歸將印辭去，不然，禍且起。」
呂祿以為酈兄不欺己，遂解印屬典客，而以兵授太尉。
太尉將之入軍門，行令軍中曰：「為呂氏右袒，為劉氏左袒。」
軍中皆左袒為劉氏。
太尉行至，將軍呂祿亦已解上將印去，太尉遂將北軍。

translations.literal: On the morning of the gengshen day of the eighth month, Marquis of Pingyang Chu acting as Imperial Secretary saw Prime Minister Chan to plan matters. Gentleman of the Palace Jia Shou, sent as envoy from Qi, came and enumerated Chan's faults, saying: "If the king does not go to his state early, now even if you wish to go, can you still obtain it?" He fully informed Chan that Guan Ying had formed a vertical alliance with Qi and Chu wishing to execute the various Lü, then urged Chan to urgently enter the palace. Marquis of Pingyang had somewhat heard his words and galloped to inform the prime minister and grand commandant. The Grand Commandant wished to enter the Northern Army but could not enter. Marquis of Xiangping Tong was in charge of tallies and tokens. They then had him hold the token and falsely admit the Grand Commandant into the Northern Army. The Grand Commandant again had Li Ji and Chief of Guests Liu Jie first persuade Lü Lu, saying: "The emperor has sent the Grand Commandant to defend the Northern Army and wishes you to go to your state; urgently return the general's seal, take leave, and depart—if not, disaster will arise." Lü Lu believing Li as his elder brother would not deceive him then removed the seal, handed it over to the Chief of Guests, and handed over troops to the Grand Commandant. The Grand Commandant took command and entered the army gate, issued orders throughout the army, saying: "Those for the Lü clan bare the right shoulder; those for the Liu clan bare the left shoulder." Throughout the army all bared the left shoulder for the Liu clan. The Grand Commandant traveled to his post; General Lü Lu had also already removed and handed over the supreme general's seal and departed; the Grand Commandant then commanded the Northern Army.

sentences.zh: 然尚有南軍。
平陽侯聞之，以呂產謀告丞相平，丞相平乃召朱虛侯佐太尉。
太尉令朱虛侯監軍門。
令平陽侯告衛尉：「毋入相國產殿門。」
呂產不知呂祿已去北軍，乃入未央宮，欲為亂，殿門弗得入，裴回往來。
平陽侯恐弗勝，馳語太尉。
太尉尚恐不勝諸呂，未敢訟言誅之，乃遣朱虛侯謂曰：「急入宮衛帝。」
朱虛侯請卒，太尉予卒千餘人。
入未央宮門，遂見產廷中。
日餔時，遂擊產。
產走，天風大起，以故其從官亂，莫敢鬬。
逐產，殺之郎中府吏廁中。

translations.literal: However, there was still the Southern Army. Marquis of Pingyang heard of this and reported Lü Chan's plotting to Prime Minister Ping; Prime Minister Ping then summoned Marquis of Zhuxu to assist the Grand Commandant. The Grand Commandant ordered Marquis of Zhuxu to supervise the army gate. He ordered Marquis of Pingyang to inform the Guard Commander: "Do not admit Prime Minister Chan into the palace gate." Lü Chan did not know Lü Lu had already left the Northern Army and entered Weiyang Palace wishing to create disorder, but could not enter the palace gate and paced back and forth. Marquis of Pingyang feared he could not prevail and galloped to inform the Grand Commandant. The Grand Commandant still feared he could not prevail over the various Lü and did not yet dare openly speak of executing them, so he sent Marquis of Zhuxu with the message: "Urgently enter the palace to defend the emperor." Marquis of Zhuxu requested troops; the Grand Commandant gave him over a thousand men. He entered Weiyang Palace gate and then saw Chan in the courtyard. At the time of the afternoon meal, he then struck Chan. Chan fled; Heaven sent a great wind that arose, and because of this his attending officials were in disorder and none dared fight. Pursuing Chan, they killed him in the privy of the Gentleman's Office.

sentences.zh: 朱虛侯已殺產，帝命謁者持節勞朱虛侯。
朱虛侯欲奪節信，謁者不肯，朱虛侯則從與載，因節信馳走，斬長樂衛尉呂更始。
還，馳入北軍，報太尉。
太尉起，拜賀朱虛侯曰：「所患獨呂產，今已誅，天下定矣。」
遂遣人分部悉捕諸呂男女，無少長皆斬之。
辛酉，捕斬呂祿，而笞殺呂媭。
使人誅燕王呂通，而廢魯王偃。
壬戌，以帝太傅食其復為左丞相。
戊辰，徙濟川王王梁，立趙幽王子遂為趙王。
遣朱虛侯章以誅諸呂氏事告齊王，令罷兵。
灌嬰兵亦罷滎陽而歸。

translations.literal: Having killed Chan, Marquis of Zhuxu, the emperor ordered a herald bearing a token to thank Marquis of Zhuxu. Marquis of Zhuxu wished to seize the token; the herald refused; Marquis of Zhuxu then rode together with him in the chariot, and using the token galloped off, beheading Guard Commander of Changle Lü Gengshi. Returning, he galloped into the Northern Army and reported to the Grand Commandant. The Grand Commandant rose and bowed in congratulation to Marquis of Zhuxu, saying: "What we feared was only Lü Chan; now he has been executed, all under Heaven is settled." They then sent men to divide into sections to completely arrest all Lü males and females; none, young or old, were spared—all were beheaded. On the xinyou day, they arrested and beheaded Lü Lu and flogged Lü Xu to death. They sent men to execute King Lü Tong of Yan and deposed King Yan of Lu. On the renxu day, they made Grand Tutor of the Emperor Yiji again Left Prime Minister. On the wuchen day, they moved King of Jichuan to rule Liang and installed the son of King You of Zhao, Sui, as King of Zhao. They sent Marquis of Zhuxu Zhang to inform the King of Qi of the matter of executing the various Lü clan and ordered him to dismiss his troops. Guan Ying's troops also dismissed from Yingyang and returned.

sentences.zh: 諸大臣相與陰謀曰：「少帝及梁、淮陽、常山王，皆非真孝惠子也。
呂后以計詐名他人子，殺其母，養後宮，令孝惠子之，立以為後，及諸王，以彊呂氏。
今皆已夷滅諸呂，而置所立，即長用事，吾屬無類矣。
不如視諸王最賢者立之。」
或言「齊悼惠王高帝長子，今其適子為齊王，推本言之，高帝適長孫，可立也」。
大臣皆曰：「呂氏以外家惡而幾危宗廟，亂功臣今齊王母家駟（鈞），駟鈞，惡人也。
即立齊王，則復為呂氏。」
欲立淮南王，以為少，母家又惡。
乃曰：「代王方今高帝見子，最長，仁孝寬厚。
太后家薄氏謹良。
且立長故順，以仁孝聞於天下，便。」
乃相與共陰使人召代王。
代王使人辭謝。
再反，然後乘六乘傳。
後九月晦日己酉，至長安，舍代邸。
大臣皆往謁，奉天子璽上代王，共尊立為天子。
代王數讓，群臣固請，然後聽。

translations.literal: The various great ministers secretly plotted together, saying: "The young emperor and the kings of Liang, Huaiyang, and Changshan are all not truly sons of Emperor Xiaohui. Empress Lü by stratagem deceitfully named other people's sons, killed their mothers, raised them in the rear palace, had Emperor Xiaohui claim them as sons, and installed them as heirs and as the various kings to strengthen the Lü clan. Now we have already exterminated all the various Lü, yet if we keep those who were installed and they grow up to handle affairs, we will have no posterity. It would be better to examine which of the kings is most worthy and install him." Some said: "King Daohui of Qi was the High Emperor's eldest son; now his legitimate son is King of Qi; tracing it to the origin, he is the High Emperor's legitimate eldest grandson and can be installed." The great ministers all said: "The Lü clan as external family were wicked and nearly endangered the ancestral temples, disordering the meritorious ministers; now the King of Qi's maternal family is Sijun—Sijun are wicked people. If we install the King of Qi, it will again become like the Lü clan." They wished to install the King of Huainan but considered him young and his maternal family also wicked. They then said: "The King of Dai is presently the High Emperor's surviving son, the eldest, benevolent, filial, generous, and magnanimous. The Grand Empress's family, the Bo clan, are careful and good. Moreover, installing the eldest follows proper order; as he is known for benevolence and filial piety throughout all under Heaven, it is convenient." They then together secretly sent men to summon the King of Dai. The King of Dai sent men to decline and express thanks. After going back and forth twice, he then rode in six relay chariots. On the last day of the ninth month, the jiyou day, he reached Chang'an and lodged at the Dai residence. The great ministers all went to pay respects, presented the Son of Heaven's seal to the King of Dai, and together honored and installed him as Son of Heaven. The King of Dai declined several times; the assembled ministers firmly requested, and then he listened.

sentences.zh: 東牟侯興居曰：「誅呂氏吾無功，請得除宮。」
乃與太仆汝陰侯滕公入宮，前謂少帝曰：「足下非劉氏，不當立。」
乃顧麾左右執戟者掊兵罷去。
有數人不肯去兵，宦者令張澤諭告，亦去兵。
滕公乃召乘輿車載少帝出。
少帝曰：「欲將我安之乎？」
滕公曰「出就舍。」
舍少府。
乃奉天子法駕，迎代王於邸。
報曰：「宮謹除。」
代王即夕入未央宮。
有謁者十人持戟衛端門，曰：「天子在也，足下何為者而入？」
代王乃謂太尉。
太尉往諭，謁者十人皆掊兵而去。
代王遂入而聽政。
夜，有司分部誅滅梁、淮陽、常山王及少帝於邸。
代王立為天子。
二十三年崩，謚為孝文皇帝。

translations.literal: Marquis of Dongmou Xingju said: "In executing the Lü clan I had no merit; I request to be allowed to purge the palace." He then with Grand Coachman Marquis of Ruyin Duke Teng entered the palace, went before the young emperor and said: "You are not of the Liu clan and should not be installed." He then looked back and gestured to those around holding halberds to lay down their weapons and withdraw. Several men refused to lay down their weapons; Eunuch Commander Zhang Ze instructed and informed them, and they also laid down their weapons. Duke Teng then summoned the imperial chariot to carry the young emperor out. The young emperor said: "Where do you wish to take me?" Duke Teng said: "Going out to your residence." They lodged him at the Junior Supervisor's. They then presented the Son of Heaven's ceremonial procession and welcomed the King of Dai at the residence. They reported: "The palace has been carefully purged." The King of Dai that very evening entered Weiyang Palace. There were ten heralds holding halberds guarding the palace gate, saying: 'The Son of Heaven is here, why are you entering?' The King of Dai then addressed the Grand Commandant. The Grand Commandant went to instruct them; the ten heralds all laid down their weapons and departed. The King of Dai then entered and attended to government. By night, the officials divided into sections to execute and exterminate the kings of Liang, Huaiyang, and Changshan as well as the young emperor at their residences. The King of Dai was installed as Son of Heaven. After twenty-three years he died; his posthumous title was Emperor Xiaowen.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：孝惠皇帝、高后之時，黎民得離戰國之苦，君臣俱欲休息乎無為，故惠帝垂拱，高后女主稱制，政不出房戶，天下晏然。
刑罰罕用，罪人是希。
民務稼穡，衣食滋殖。

translations.literal: The Grand Historian says: During the time of Emperor Hui and Empress Gao, the common people got to leave the suffering of the Warring States, lords and ministers all wished to rest in non-action, therefore Emperor Hui hung up his sleeves in waiting, Empress Gao as female ruler issued decrees, government did not leave the inner chambers, the realm was peaceful. Punishments were rarely used; criminals were few. The people focused on agriculture; clothing and food grew abundant.
